column1: Smoque BBQ////Our party trickled in ~7pm on a Friday night and this place was just beginning to get completely packed
column2: the line running out the door.  Staff is as friendly as can be
column3: and helps to facilitate the line and counter to table self-serve and seating.  Open view into the kitchen shows this place is spotless and a tightly run unit.  Gotta love this place.
